problem.markdown:
>>Which are two purposes of using a calendar table in a data model?<<
[ ] To list all the available dates in the calendar year. [x] To filter by year, month, or week. [x] To perform advanced calculations such as year-over-year comparison. [ ] To keep a timestamp of records in a transactional or fact table.
[explanation] A calendar table is useful to perform advanced calculations and create date related filters. [explanation]
problem.p: Which are two purposes of using a calendar table in a data model?
